title: Developing Kilometers-long Gravity Heat Pipe for Geothermal Energy Exploitation

At medium-deep and deep depths of Earth crust lays vast and so far mostly untapped reserves of geothermal energy. This energy source has the potential of meeting humanity’s needs for...
